com.pump.image.jpeg

Class JPEGMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.image.jpeg.JPEGMetaData

  • public class JPEGMetaData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class parses JPEG metadata to retrieve properties or thumbnails.
    See Also:
    com.pump.image.jpeg.JPEGMetaDataDemo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a JPEGMetaData object.
      JPEGMetaData(java.io.InputStream in, boolean fetchThumbnail)
      Creates a JPEGMetaData object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JPEGMetaData

        public JPEGMetaData(java.io.File file,
                    boolean fetchThumbnail)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a JPEGMetaData object.
        Parameters:
        file - the JPEG image.
        fetchThumbnail - whether the thumbnail should be retrieved. If this is false then getThumbnail() will return false, but properties will still be loaded (if possible).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • JPEGMetaData

        public JPEGMetaData(java.io.InputStream in,
                    boolean fetchThumbnail)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a JPEGMetaData object.
        Parameters:
        in - the JPEG image.
        fetchThumbnail - whether the thumbnail should be retrieved. If this is false then getThumbnail() will return false, but properties will still be loaded (if possible).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getThumbnail

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getThumbnail(java.io.File file)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Extract a thumbnail from a JPEG file, if possible. This may return null if no thumbnail can be found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • getThumbnail

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getThumbnail(java.io.InputStream in)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Extract a thumbnail from a JPEG image, if possible. This may return null if no thumbnail can be found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • getThumbnail

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getThumbnail(java.net.URL url)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Extract a thumbnail from a JPEG image, if possible. This may return null if no thumbnail can be found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO problem occurs.

      • processException

        protected void processException(java.lang.Exception e,
                                java.lang.String marker)
        This is called when an exception occurs trying to parse an block of data. The default implementation is simply to call e.printStackTrace(), but subclasses can override this as needed.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception that occurred.
        marker - the type of marker we were trying to process.

      • processAPP0

        protected void processAPP0(com.pump.image.jpeg.APP0Data data)
        This is called when an APP0Data object has been parsed.

        The default implementation is simply to retrieve the thumbnail, but subclasses can override this to do extra work.

        Parameters:
        data - the newly parsed data.

      • processAPP13

        protected void processAPP13(com.pump.image.jpeg.APP13Data data)
        This is called when an APP13Data object has been parsed.

        The default implementation is simply to retrieve the thumbnail, but subclasses can override this to do extra work.

        Parameters:
        data - the newly parsed data.

      • processAPP2

        protected void processAPP2(com.pump.image.jpeg.APP2Data data)
        This is called when an APP2Data object has been parsed.

        The default implementation is simply to retrieve the thumbnail, but subclasses can override this to do extra work.

        Parameters:
        data - the newly parsed data.

      • processAPP1

        protected void processAPP1(com.pump.image.jpeg.APP1Data data)
        This is called when an APP1Data object has been parsed.

        The default implementation is to retrieve the thumbnail and add the properties, but subclasses can override this to do extra work.

        Parameters:
        data - the newly parsed data.

      • processComment

        protected void processComment(java.lang.String comment)
        This is called when a comment marker has been parsed.

        The default implementation is to add this comment, but subclasses can override this to do extra work.

        Parameters:
        comment - the newly parsed comment.

      • getProperties

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getProperties()
        Returns the map of properties found in this JPEG. This will not be null, but it may be empty.

        Note this does not return a clone of this map, so if you change the contents of this map then this metadata object is permanently altered.

      • getComments

        public java.lang.String[] getComments()
        Return the comments found in this JPEG, if any.

      • getThumbnail

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getThumbnail()
        Returns the thumbnail if one exists. This may return null.
